name: Scholastic Corporation
description: Scholastic Corporation is a leading global children's publishing, education, and media company, best known for its commitment to fostering a love of reading and learning among children. Founded in 1920, Scholastic has become a trusted name in educational materials, publishing beloved book series such as Harry Potter, The Hunger Games, and Clifford the Big Red Dog. The company operates through various segments, including Trade Publishing, Educational Publishing, and International, serving schools, libraries, and families with a wide range of books, magazines, and educational resources. Scholastic is also a major player in the educational technology space, providing digital learning solutions that enhance literacy skills and engagement. With a mission to promote the joy of reading, Scholastic hosts various initiatives, such as book fairs and reading clubs, aiming to make quality literature accessible to children everywhere. The company emphasizes diversity and inclusivity in its publications, reflecting the diverse world in which children live. Scholastic continues to innovate as it embraces technology to meet the changing needs of educators and young readers, ensuring its materials are relevant and impactful in the 21st century.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
